channel.title: davewiner tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from davewiner.

item.description: @ton_zylstra @jdevalk thanks, i found a bunch of stuff to subscribe to but i didn't see where your blog is (assuming you have one)..
item.source:markdown: @ton_zylstra @jdevalk thanks, i found a bunch of stuff to subscribe to but i didn't see where your blog is (assuming you have one)..

item.description:
I will never get used to the new name for the Cleveland baseball team. I can't even bring myself to type it.

I wonder why the Atlanta baseball team is allowed to continue using their name?
item.source:markdown:
I will never get used to the new name for the Cleveland baseball team. I can't even bring myself to type it.
I wonder why the Atlanta baseball team is allowed to continue using their name?

item.description:
This is something Doc Searls, the nicest guy you'll ever meet, might say. 😀

https://t.co/cz3RvuVOyi
item.source:markdown:
This is something Doc Searls, the nicest guy you'll ever meet, might say. 😀
https://t.co/cz3RvuVOyi

item.description:
5/6 The Mets might still win, because the Braves, their main competitors in the NL East are slumping now too.

6/6 This is why people who really engage with sports laugh when the politicos on TV say they know how elections two years away will go.
item.source:markdown:
5/6 The Mets might still win, because the Braves, their main competitors in the NL East are slumping now too.
6/6 This is why people who really engage with sports laugh when the politicos on TV say they know how elections two years away will go.

item.description:
1/6 The Mets are one of the top teams in baseball this year along with the Yankees, Dodgers and Braves.

2/6 They have an "easy" schedule in Sept, so they were "expected" to cruise into the post season without a care.

3/6 On top of that, they took a series from the great Dodgers, boosting the team confidence even more.
item.source:markdown:
1/6 The Mets are one of the top teams in baseball this year along with the Yankees, Dodgers and Braves.
2/6 They have an "easy" schedule in Sept, so they were "expected" to cruise into the post season without a care.
3/6 On top of that, they took a series from the great Dodgers, boosting the team confidence even more.

item.description: @core @om btw fyi -- i live in a place with no cell service. see the problem??
item.source:markdown: @core @om btw fyi -- i live in a place with no cell service. see the problem??

item.description: @shacker @om If I got in my car and tried to go somewhere and it said sorry we don't go there any longer, well since I drive a Tesla I do expect that day to come.
item.source:markdown: @shacker @om If I got in my car and tried to go somewhere and it said sorry we don't go there any longer, well since I drive a Tesla I do expect that day to come.

item.description: The Space Between Brain Death and Organ Donation. https://t.co/kkk3nocl3X
item.source:markdown: The Space Between Brain Death and Organ Donation. https://t.co/kkk3nocl3X

item.description: @shacker @om I manage the music myself. It's okay I got a nice new Android phone, and they let me use the Finder to copy music onto the phone, and I'm happy -- I'm gradually weaning myself off Apple.
item.source:markdown: @shacker @om I manage the music myself. It's okay I got a nice new Android phone, and they let me use the Finder to copy music onto the phone, and I'm happy -- I'm gradually weaning myself off Apple.

item.description: @om I can't figure out how to get music from my new Mac onto my new iPhone. They changed everything. I've looked everywhere for simple instructions, but they don't work. I don't think Apple can claim that they do "simple" any longer.
item.source:markdown: @om I can't figure out how to get music from my new Mac onto my new iPhone. They changed everything. I've looked everywhere for simple instructions, but they don't work. I don't think Apple can claim that they do "simple" any longer.

item.description: If you read RSS feeds -- tell me about some of your favorite feeds, and please include the URL of the feed. Thanks! ;-)

item.description:
@ton_zylstra @jdevalk I'm actively rebuilding my feeds world now.

Do you have a list of interesting feeds you would share with me??
item.source:markdown:

item.description:
I want to add some new feeds to my reader, specifically interested in good Substack-type feeds by people readers of my blog might find interesting.

I'm going to demonstrate an idea I think all writers should work on, presenting collections of feeds of sources they value.

om -- you're already in my collection. ;-)
item.source:markdown:
I want to add some new feeds to my reader, specifically interested in good Substack-type feeds by people readers of my blog might find interesting.
I'm going to demonstrate an idea I think all writers should work on, presenting collections of feeds of sources they value.
om -- you're already in my collection. ;-)
